mapper.select: select DISTINCT name,code,sample_image.link from star,movie,sample_image,movie_star_relation,movie_sample_image_relation where movie.id=#{movieId} and movie.id=movie_star_relation.movie_id and star.id=movie_star_relation.star_id and movie.id=movie_sample_image_relation.movie_id and sample_image.id=movie_sample_image_relation.sample_image_id
